div.p: Same as Fig. 3 but for differences in ( a) the Arctic sea ice concentration (shaded) and surface albedo (contoured) in percentage, ( b) surface net shortwave downward flux [W m −2], ( c) surface net longwave flux [W m −2] (shaded) and total cloud area fraction (contoured), ( d) surface net radiation [W m −2], ( e) turbulent fluxes (latent + sensible) [W m −2], and ( f) surface net radiation minus turbulent fluxes (( d) minus ( e)) to assess the energy balance [W m −2].
